description:
encoding/json: remove unused struct field

I added this field in 2011 in http://golang.org/change/5199c9ed7472.
Not sure why I did that, because it has never been used.
And so now it is removed.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

It was to test that unexported fields aren't marshaled. That still
seems relevant. Perhaps just set it explicitly in a test?

subject: code review 11995043: encoding/json: remove unused struct field
